A story about a world where music has disappeared, and a group of people must work together to find a way to bring it back.
A documentary about the history of music and how it has evolved over time.
A novel that explores the impact of music on society and the consequences of its disappearance.
A podcast that delves into the science behind music and why it has such a powerful effect on our emotions.
A play that follows a group of characters as they navigate their lives without music and discover new ways to express themselves.
